Omega.expr: max( min( x-(centerx-slotwidth/2), min( (centerx+slotwidth/2)-x, min( z-(centerz-slotwidth/2), min( (centerz+slotwidth/2)-z, (centery-radius+slotlength)-y ) ) ) ), sqrt(pow(x-centerx,2)+pow(y-centery,2)+pow(z-centerz,2)) - radius ) :x:y:z:centerx:centery:centerz:radius:slotwidth:slotlength
